root.name: Capcom Puzzle World
root.description: Capcom has become synonymous with putting out compilations. In this compilation collection, the developer makes some interesting choices to bring together some of its most popular puzzle games. In this collection Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo is like the centerpiece at a redneck wedding, beautiful flowers surrounded by bongs and beer bottles. Capcom Puzzle World also includes versions of Buster Bros., Super Buster Bros., Buster Buddies, and Block Block. With five titles, this compilation is worth the PSN price of $10.PS Vita CompatibilityDespite not being in the official compatibility list, Capcom Puzzle World can be played on the PS Vita. To do this, the user must first download the game to the PS3. From there, go to Content Transfer on the PS Vita and select the game for transfer. Once complete, the game will show up on the Vita's menu.
